post_text: As a precautionary measure, we will equip each classroom with ultraviolet lights that will be on at night and kill all bacteria in the room, including COVID. We will be sanitizing rooms with other substances, but the UV rays are proven to be very effective as a disinfectant. We will also offer face shields that are 100% transparent and what you would use in a school science lab, for each student, if you choose to take one. We want to give each student a safe environment, but also have the special touch that makes a school a great place to be. Thank you for your support!
